definition.featurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block deletable="false" type="feature_container" x="40" y="40"><value name="feature"><block inline="false" type="feature_replace_sphere"><comment h="114" pinned="false" w="249">This block represents a blob feature that replaces netherrack with blackstone, like the ones that generate in the Nether.This feature should be generated during the UNDERGROUND_DECORATION stage</comment><value name="targetState"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">CUSTOM:Revelite</field><comment h="80" pinned="false" w="160">This is the block being replaced (in this case netherrack)</comment></block></value><value name="newState"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">CUSTOM:Lithum</field><comment h="80" pinned="false" w="160">This is the block that will be placed by the feature (in this case blackstone)</comment></block></value><value name="radius"><block type="int_provider_uniform"><field name="min">3</field><field name="max">7</field><comment h="80" pinned="false" w="160">This is the size of the blob</comment></block></value></block></value><next><block type="placement_count"><comment h="80" pinned="false" w="160">We try to generate up to 25 blackstone blobs in each chunk</comment><value name="count"><block type="int_provider_constant"><field name="value">25</field></block></value><next><block type="placement_in_square"><comment h="83" pinned="false" w="182">We then move each blob horizontally. This way they don't generate only in the corner of the chunk</comment><next><block type="placement_height_uniform"><comment h="78" pinned="false" w="191">The blobs have uniform distribution, so they can generate at any height with the same probability.</comment><value name="min"><block type="vertical_anchor_above_bottom"><field name="value">0</field></block></value><value name="max"><block type="vertical_anchor_below_top"><field name="value">0</field></block></value><next><block type="placement_biome_filter"/></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
